biotools.summary:
A software suite for analysis of paired-sample transposon insertion sequencing data.

CAFE – Coefficient-based Analysis of Fitness by read Enrichments.

The R package part of CAFE can be installed in R using the devtools package and: install_github("bengtssonpalme/cafe").

bioschemas.name: CAFE-R
